@langenberg_jm slash can crit. But the extra damage added as thorns by Hack or your 2pc and 6pc cannot.
Thorns CANNOT Critical hit so CC / CHD is poor with Invoker. This is intentional so you don't want those two stats on your rings/amulets.
@gromdul We are removing heal monks in particular, not zdps in general.

@leo_kamwathi there are no plans to allow cubing a set bonus. We're happy with what the interplay of sets, the cube, and LoN will be as is
@Anarkila The ancient items are counted up and then mult with other effects. Example: 6 ancients X 800% is 4800% mult bonus on dmg
@uniqlol one tab per season. With the gold purchase one in 2.4 you'll be at 10 tabs after 4 seasons.
@KSBpodcast the new cube recipe is primary stat only. It doesn't work for diamonds.

Really stoked to see all the excitement surrounding the new Legacy of Nightmares set redesign - the no-set set!
@Fetzie_ some performance optimizations are planned. We'll do our best. There's no silver bullet but we have awesome engineers on it.
Legacy of Nightmares should increase build diversity not reduce it. If it is outperforming all class sets we'll reduce the 800% during PTR.
@walkintall93 yes belt of the trove procs the 50% - but note - the bombard must hit an enemy so there is a small window of vulnerability
However, we will be tuning Legacy of Nightmares during PTR. So expect the % to come down if it is overperforming.
Legacy of Nightmares/Wailing Host is 800% PER ANCIENT. The screenshot on the panel was old.
@Serpher when you apply the new cube recipe to an item that is already augmented you replace the old augment with the new one.
@walkintall93 there's already more than 1 legendary item for bombardment so it's probably in a good place once it also has set support
